## Call.Listener.ConnectFailure type

Connect failure event listener. This should be the function signature of any event listener bound to the [Call.Event.ConnectFailure](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.event_enum.md) event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type ConnectFailure = (error: GenericError) => void;
```
